creator: HBX Controls
descriptionHtml:
The SensorlinxTM mobile app allows you to remotely control and monitor your HBX 0600 Series Control System for radiant/forced air Zoning, Boiler Control, Geothermal heat pump Control and Snow Melt Control. The mobile app also allows for control of the SensorlinxTM Heat and Flow meters.
0600 Series Control
The Sensorlinx mobile app is compatible with the ZON-600, THM-0600, ECO-0600, CPU-0600, SNO-0600 controllers.
• Remotely monitor and control all devices and settings
• Unlimited amount of buildings can be added to the app
• Save money with away modes
• Alarm notifications
• Real time equipment operation status with run times for boiler and geothermal heat pumps
• Easily share devices with other users
SensorlinxTM Heat and Flow Meters
The SensorlinxTM mobile app is compatible with any WFS (Flow and Temperature, WPS (Pressure and Temperature), BTU (Heat Meter) sensors.
• EN 1434 certification
• Graphs calculated for Flow/BTU’s based on hour, day, week and monthly
• Accurate calculations in glycol, methanol, and water at any concentration
• Alarm notifications for flow, temperature and pressure
• Real time data for BTU, temperature, flow, and pressure
• Manual relay operation
